Flat.desc: Designed for the market conditions, where the price stays the same during some time

Bull.desc: Designed for the market conditions, where the price is going up

Bear.desc: Designed for the market conditions, where the price is gowing down

orders_pairs.name: Order pairs
orders_pairs.desc: Amount of orders on each side of the grid

orders_start_size.name: Order start size
orders_start_size.desc: The volume of the first order in each side of the grid (in contracts)

order_step_size.name: Order step size
order_step_size.desc: The amount of volume size, added to each next volume in a grid (in contracts)

interval.name: Interval
interval.desc: The distance between two consecutive orders on each size (in quote)

min_spread.name: Minimal spread
min_spread.desc: The distance between the first buy and the first sell order (in quote)

stop_loss_fund.name: Stop loss fund
stop_loss_fund.desc: The amount of bitcoins, that are allowed to loose per position. The stop-loss order price is calculated.

min_position.name: Minimal position
min_position.desc: The minimal size of the position (in contracts)

max_position.name: Maximal position
max_position.desc: The maximal size of the position (in contracts)
